name: Identity Crisis
description:
Identity Crisis!

A top down 2D Shooter with a twist!

You start as red, the main character of the game. Enemies are coming from all sides trying to kill you. If you kill a yellow enemy, you become yellow. Then, your "identity bar" goes down. You have to become red again for it to go up, so you don't forget your identity. The game also gets progressively harder, so be on your toes.

P.S. Make sure to read the help page for more info!
